properties.query:
AIShield
| where Message has 'Natural Language Processing AI Model Extraction Attack Identified'
| where Severity =~ 'High'

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: This query detects Natural language processing model extraction vulnerability alert from AIShield generated at {{TimeGenerated}}\n\nPlease check the source for more information and investigate further.
alertDetailsOverride.alertDisplayNameFormat: AIShield - Natural language processing model extraction vulnerability detected.

properties.name: AIShield - Natural language processing model extraction vulnerability detection
properties.description: 'This alert creates an incident when Natural language processing model extraction vulnerability detected from the AIShield.'
